article from www.rugbyleague.co.nz Barbie is tipped to win big, with nine nominations - closely followed by Oppenheimer, with eight. >> More Rugby League News © 2024 Newstalk ZB, NZCity Other Rugby League News 08 Jan: The last day of NFL action has thrown up an incredible first 08 Jan: Rafael Nadal has withdrawn from the Australian Tennis Open with a hip injury 03 Jan: Working with former Kiwis captain Benji Marshall has been a major drawcard for Jarome Luai in confirming a five-year NRL deal with the Wests Tigers from 2025 03 Jan: Jarome Luai has revealed the reasons behind his switch to the Wests Tigers in 12 months time 01 Jan: An important stretch looms for the Breakers as they look to continue their climb up the ladder in the Australian Basketball League 26 Dec: NRL rugby league player Troy Dargan has died in a motorcycle accident while on holiday in the Cook Islands 26 Dec: Former captain Gary Neville has described Manchester United's year a "disgrace to the end" after Sir Jim Ratcliffe's acquisition of a 25 per cent stake in the club Top Stories RUGBY New Zealand ski star Alice Robinson has made a solid start to the 2024 portion of her Giant Slalom World Cup season, claiming an eighth-place finish at the latest event in Slovenia More... BUSINESS Australia's biggest employers will be named and shamed when their gender pay gaps are exposed More... Today's News Entertainment: Golden Globes 2024 winners list: Barbie and Oppenheimer lead film nominations, Succession dominates TV nods 12:37 Cricket: Will Cameron Bancroft get a chance to atone in the Australian test cricket side? 11:57 Rugby League: The last day of NFL action has thrown up an incredible first 11:57 Cycling: Track cyclist Aaron Gate expects next month's World Cup event in Adelaide to indicate whether New Zealand's men's team pursuit will be a medal prospect at the Paris Olympics 11:07 Health & Safety: Doctors advocates are warning medical IT systems are outdated, after a technical error at Hawke's Bay Hospital almost cost a child her life 10:37 Politics: The Prime Minister's reflecting on his quick rise to leading the country 10:27 International: Two hikers killed in Italian Alps avalanche near Switzerland 10:17 Health & Safety: A warning of the risks of IT flaws, after a near miss involving a child at a Hawke's Bay Hospital 9:27 Law and Order: Korea's deadliest strip of land the scene of brutal axe murder, assassination attempt and shooting of housewife 9:17 Environment: People in Victoria, South Australia and New South Wales are being urged to prepare, with rainfall totals of up to 200 millimeters and flooding forecast for some areas 8:17 News Search Rugby League NZ News NewsLinks NZ Web Power Search © 2024 New Zealand City Ltd
